description.en:
Things don't always work the way we want them to. This is a story of how one door closes and another opens. --- - [Original Webtoon ](https://chuchu-webtoon.postype.com/series/717380) --- - [Original Webtoon "Pre-Serialization"](https://webtoonleague.kakao.com/league/view/13905) --- - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://toomics.com/tc/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Spanish Translation](https://toomics.com/mx/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese Translation](https://toomics.com/por/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese

description.es:
Las cosas no siempre salen como uno quiere. El amor no da solo alegrías, pero dicen que cuando una puerta se cierra, otra se abre. --- - [Original Webtoon ](https://chuchu-webtoon.postype.com/series/717380) --- - [Original Webtoon "Pre-Serialization"](https://webtoonleague.kakao.com/league/view/13905) --- - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://toomics.com/tc/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Spanish Translation](https://toomics.com/mx/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese Translation](https://toomics.com/por/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese

description.it:
A volte le cose non vanno come vorremmo. Mentre altre volte vanno meglio di quanto sperassimo. --- - [Original Webtoon ](https://chuchu-webtoon.postype.com/series/717380) --- - [Original Webtoon "Pre-Serialization"](https://webtoonleague.kakao.com/league/view/13905) --- - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://toomics.com/tc/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Spanish Translation](https://toomics.com/mx/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese Translation](https://toomics.com/por/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese

description.pt:
Nem sempre o que temos planejado para a vida é o que acaba acontecendo. Jamais esqueça, entretanto, que quando uma porta se fecha, outra se abre! --- - [Original Webtoon ](https://chuchu-webtoon.postype.com/series/717380) --- - [Original Webtoon "Pre-Serialization"](https://webtoonleague.kakao.com/league/view/13905) --- - [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://toomics.com/tc/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Spanish Translation](https://toomics.com/mx/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese Translation](https://toomics.com/por/webtoon/episode/toon/4675) - [Official Portuguese
